item.title: Strong Security for Everyone!
item.description: I received some press-release-spam this week that I actually didn’t mind.

item.title: This is the best we can do?
item.description: Still working on my slides for SCALE , decided to further delay productivity by putting together a brief set of steps on how to use OpenOffice.

item.title: Sun Rewrites Java Browser Plugin
item.description: I’m not sure that Java applets are even relevant to software development today, but this interview (via Ajaxian ) regarding the rewritten Java browser plugin caught my attention:
